data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Zhemgang, Bhutan and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zhemgang, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 5 believers in Zhemgang against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, please give the church in the state of Zhemgang prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Zhemgang a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Yadav (Hindu traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, cause the 5 believers in Zhemgang to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Zhemgang, Bhutan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, move the 5 believers in the state of Zhemgang to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."
